Crafting a Bold New Esports Identity

Context

The esports industry is at a crossroads. With corporate interests and profit-driven models dominating the tournament landscape, the soul of competition often takes a backseat.

In Queue was founded to change that. Born from the collective passion of esports veterans, In Queue is an independent, worker-owned production and operations agency dedicated to authentic, community-driven competition.

To stand out in a crowded space, we needed to create a brand identity as bold and uncompromising as In Queue's vision.

Design Process

Most esports branding leans into aggressive, over-the-top aesthetics. We wanted to make something clean, confident, and iconic, that would feel at home on a indie LAN stream or a championship trophy. We explored a wide range of directions before landing on a logo that felt iconic, ownable, and natural to animate.

The final mark features four outward-facing arrows, symbolizing In Queue's core values: Integrity, Community, Opportunity, and Excellence. Its emblem-style silhouette fits naturally into the esports space while echoing the feeling of a game queue animation, a subtle nod built into the brand’s DNA.

Putting Values Front and Center

We wanted the branding to reinforce In Queue's' promise of striving to make competitive gaming more fun, more accessible, and uncompromised. Our branding was launched with a reveal video we built to gradually reveal the makeup of the logo, one element at a time, while also loudly announcing what In Queue believes in, and why.

Check out the website for In Queue.
